title: Ticket #2668: improve my_popen
description:
Currently, my_popen() provides the option to suppress stderr or to mix stderr with stdout. Neither of these options is very helpful for debugging. In some situations it would therefore be preferable to provide separate stdout and stderr pipes. In addition, a convenience function should be added that does all the work of running a command and reading all of the stderr + stdout output into strings.

One case where this has come up is in the invocation of the hibernation plugin in startd_hibernation.cpp.
